TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SseUtils extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Keep Sse.cs in sync with Avx.cs. When making changes to one, use BeyondCompare or a similar tool to view diffs and propagate appropriate changes to the other.
